title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18 ยง 343.12 - Examination of the record after hearing
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18 ยง 343.12 - Examination of the record after hearing

State Regulations

Upon reasonable notice to the department, the record of
the hearing may be examined by any party to the hearing at the department's
offices during regular business hours. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18
ยง
343.12

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
